title: Unable to make new accont
body: Hello, My friend is trying to make an account but it keeps saying  "WHOOOPS. Your sign up has failed" he has tried numerous times with different emails and credentials.  That new page doesn't seem to be working.  (  https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/index#/  )

replies.body:
First I'd recommend trying a different browser.

Failing that I'd recommend he submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They should be able to help him work out where things are going wrong.
Ill try a different browser now. He cant send them a ticket it doesn't have an account lol{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

There are some ticket categories that don't require you to login but admittedly I'm not sure there's one for new account queries specifically. You could submit a ticket for him if he's still having trouble though.

Screenshots are your friend.
You can also submit a ticket by sending it as an email to support@riotgames.com!
